product.title: Sweet Honey Flower Bees
product.body_html:
• Description
  • Cleaning
  • Shipping

  • Time to wake up and smell the flowers 

    These adorable bee plushies are wearing cute flowers around their head, making them perfect for Spring and Summer cuddling. You can tell they always get their honey from the sweetest of flowers!

    Filled with 100% PP cotton and made with a soft outer layer so you can melt your face into these plushies without having to worry about anything.

    These plushies are sold individually and are available in 2 styles and a size of 30cm/12in (length includes tail).

    A special gift for your loved ones

    Looking for a special gift for your loved ones? This plumpy plushie is an amazing choice if you are looking for something that is unique and high in quality. These raccoon stuffed animals are super soft, and cuddly, and will never let go of them! It's so adorable that even your family and friends will fall in love with it.

    Ready for cuddles all night long

    ✨ Filled with 100% premium PP cotton
    💖 Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    😊 Allergy-free and asthma friendly

    Plushie sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-3cm due to the nature of how PP cotton expands and compresses.

  • Step 1: Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.

    Step 2: Wash our plushie in cold water using a mild detergent.

    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.

    Step 4: Place the plushie in a launderable mesh bag or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!

    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the plushie has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.


    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: 5-20 Business days
